Uses of FTPConnection in it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j
 

Methods in it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j that return FTPConnection
 FTPConnection FTPConnector.connectForCommunicationChannel(java.lang.String host, int port)
          This methods returns an established connection to a remote host, suitable for a FTP communication channel.
 FTPConnection FTPConnector.connectForDataTransferChannel(java.lang.String host, int port)
          This methods returns an established connection to a remote host, suitable for a FTP data transfer channel.
